actionConfiguration.body:
select td.test_id, td.test_name, td.chapter_tag, cdm.chapter_name, 
ctt.start_date, ctt.end_date, ctt.test_url ,count(*) as total_questions_count, td.questions_requested, count(distinct qd.lb_question_tag) as sel_ques
		
-- select td.test_id, td.test_name, td.chapter_tag, cdm.chapter_name, td.questions_requested, td.deadline, 
-- 		qd.question_number, qd.lb_question_tag, ctt.start_date, ctt.end_date, ctt.test_url
from public.test_details as td
left join content.ly_question_details as qd on td.test_name = qd.test_name
	and td.chapter_tag = qd.chapter_tag
	and td.test_id = qd.test_id
join public.course_test_track as ctt
	on td.test_id = ctt.test_id
join public.chapter_details_master as cdm
	on td.chapter_tag = cdm.chapter_tag
where td.test_id = {{test_name.selectedOptionValue}}

group by td.test_id, td.test_name, td.chapter_tag, cdm.chapter_name, 
		ctt.start_date, ctt.end_date, ctt.test_url, td.questions_requested
order by td.chapter_tag, td.test_name
